name: Radioscope
description:
Made for Loren Schmidt's "Fermi Paradox Game Jam." A toy intended to show the futility of searching for life with radio telescopes.

Your goal is to find life in a randomly-generated star field. Mark stars that you think have life, and be evaluated after your time is up. Or maybe just enjoy the procedural history of each star. It's up to you.

Press Z to scan a star for its details.
Press X to mark a star as potentially containing life.
Press R to restart the game.
